Language.entry: Don't think about this as a map. Think about it as a statement about who you are as a person.
This should be at least 10 times more expensive than it is.
This should be at least 10 times more expensive than it is.
This should be at least 10 times more expensive than it is.
This should be at least 10 times more expensive than it is.
Vessel. Though bound, you shall know the state of the world. Hallownest will be whole again.
Vessel. Though bound, you shall know the state of the world.
Fresh organic DREAM PLANT ORBS sourced from local independent DREAM PLANT farms. Please support your hardworking neighborhood DREAM MOTHS.
Hot new addition to your randomizer!
Limited edition Lifeblood masks - get them while they last!
We're having a fire sale today. Go ahead and pick up your rebate already.
Comes with a cup, lid, and sippy straw. No additional refills.
What secrets could lie on this tablet?
IDK, seems pretty useful if you ask me.
A bottled grub. Perfect for making juice, sauce, or any tasty meal really. We only have green ones in stock though.
Press and hold the slow cast button to heal.
Press and hold the slow cast button to heal.
The power of buoyancy is yours.
I may not look like it, but I'm actually a fully certified swimming instructor. One easy payment, I toss you in the deep end, and, yeah, you'll figure it out from there.
Your character seems pretty underpowered, huh. Let's fix that.
Your character seems pretty underpowered, huh. Let's fix that.
Your character seems pretty underpowered, huh. Let's fix that.
Your character seems pretty underpowered, huh. Let's fix that.
while sliding against a wall to jump.
Only works on the left though!
Part of a claw carved from bone. Allows the wearer to cling to walls on the left and leap off of them.
while sliding against a wall to jump.
Only works on the right though!
Part of a claw carved from bone. Allows the wearer to cling to walls on the right and leap off of them.
Claw carved from bone. Allows the wearer to cling to walls and leap off of them.
Use the cloak to dash quickly along the ground or through the air.
Cloak threaded with mothwing strands. Allows the wearer to dash to the left along the ground or through the air.
Use the cloak to dash quickly along the ground or through the air.
Cloak threaded with mothwing strands. Allows the wearer to dash to the right along the ground or through the air.
Cloak threaded with mothwing strands. Allows the wearer to dash forwards along the ground or through the air.
Cloak formed from the substance of the Abyss. Allows the wearer to dash through enemies and their attacks without taking damage.
Cloak formed from the substance of the Abyss. Allows the wearer to dash to the left through enemies and their attacks without taking damage.
Cloak formed from the substance of the Abyss. Allows the wearer to dash to the right through enemies and their attacks without taking damage.
while on the ground or clinging to a wall to concentrate the force.
Release the button to blast left and fly through the air.
Part of the energy core of an old mining golem, fashioned around a potent crystal. The crystal's energy can be channeled to launch the bearer to the left at dangerous speeds.
while on the ground or clinging to a wall to concentrate the force.
Release the button to blast right and fly through the air.
Part of the energy core of an old mining golem, fashioned around a potent crystal. The crystal's energy can be channeled to launch the bearer to the right at dangerous speeds.
The cost of this item is a secret!

Changes to location settings will not affect old save files.
Ah, hello. How have you been faring? Have you come to bring me something tasty? Let me see...
Oh? Well, if you have no desire to get my items, I can not help you.
Give Jiji all that you can?

Aaaaaaaaahhhhhhhh!<page>That {0}... beautiful! Most precious thing! Little lovely, will you let me see it? Have to show it to me!
<page>I want it... The smell of {0}... I want it!
Drop all Geo into the fountain for {0}?
So we serve... Thus it has ever been. Yes?<page>Take the {0} then, it is why you came here.
A cocoon chained with a simple lock. You can sense the {0} inside.
Accept the Gift, even knowing you'll only get a lousy {0}?

The Maiden's Treasure
Pondering what to gift her saviour, the damsel thought of the precious {0} under her room. Though difficult to part with, she had nothing better with which to thank them.

A corpse in white armour. You can clearly see the {0} it's holding, but for some reason you get the feeling you're going to have to go through an unnecessarily long gauntlet of spikes and sawblades just to pick it up.
A corpse in white armour. You already got the stuff it was holding.
<page>It would be different if you were wearing {0}...

An emptiness that was hidden within, now unconstrained. Unifies the void under the bearer's will.
This charm can be unequipped to make the Shade and Siblings hostile once more.
